mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_email, member_nickname, member_password, member_registration_day, member_last_login, member_auth) VALUES ( #{memberEmail}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberPassword}, NOW(), NOW(), #{memberAuth})
mapper.select: SELECT member_no, member_email, member_nickname, member_password, member_registration_day, member_last_login, member_auth FROM member WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
